original_title: Paul Hardcastle: Journey to a Different State of Mind
overview: Featuring a collection of his most transcendent songs, this multimedia volume from contemporary jazzman Paul Hardcastle incorporates mind-blowing imagery that's the perfect accompaniment for the visionary instrumentalist's avant-garde works. Musicals selections include "Constellation of Dreams," "Emerald Stardust," "Return of the Rainman," "Through the Looking Glass" and "Spirits of the Mind's Eye."
title: Paul Hardcastle: Journey to a Different State of Mind
